title: good places to buy typographic posters/prints/artwork?
content:
I recently moved into a new apartment and came into posession of a big, stainless steel, Helvetica _a_. I've been hunting for artwork that fits my living room and incorporates type, so far without success.

So,

Where do you go when you're looking for something typographic to hang on your wall?
author: pica pusher

comments.content:
Try-

Keep Calm Gallery - [http://www.keepcalmgallery.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140806200953/http:/www.keepcalmgallery.com/ "http://www.keepcalmgallery.com")

Andy Smith - [http://www.asmithillustration.com/shop.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140806200953/http:/www.asmithillustration.com/shop.html "http://www.asmithillustration.com/shop.html")

They both have cool screenprints
Those are very cool, thanks guys! Impressive the range of styles type lends itself to.
